## Hey!  <img src = "https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/74038190/238201078-6f564d9a-467a-4bba-ad3a-8527c8ab79ae.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..81NZxYMIg7dbCUjrv6gSwT6dM-MT2B0dgqqzdRnJ4tQ" width = 40px>


My name is **Sofia Valverde** and I'm a **Computer Engineering** undergrad at Unicamp 📚. I'm also a member of **Driverless Vehicle** at Unicamp E-Racing🏎️ where we build an autonomous formula vehicle.
